Product Title: Luby Portable Movie Projector with Free Projector Screen Perfect for Fun Camping Neighborhood Gathering Backyard Movie
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2019
Review Description: This projector comes with the projector itself, a user manule, various cables, a remote control, and, surprisingly, a projector screen! The projector is easy to use! I just need to connect the power cable with the projector and the outlet and press the power button to activate it.I do not have an adaptor to connect one of the cables with my PC or my iPhone for now, so can't show how it works with movies. But the initial image projected on my wall,  which is yellowish, was pretty clear and bright after adjusting the focus.Additionally, the projector has multiple input ports. It's really convenient to use different devices with this projector!!

Review Description: A great mini projector! It was easy to set up.  It Comes with a remote and great quality picture ,sound is nice loud enough for us to hear it clearly. Cannot wait to use it with my kids.

Product Title: Luby Portable Movie Projector with Free Projector Screen Perfect for Fun Camping Neighborhood Gathering Backyard Movie
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2019
Review Title: Easy to use,picture quality , movie nights!
Review Description: Very important for people who enjoy life,  Luby projector is really easy to set up. After using it for a movie I can honestly say that it's more than worth the money! I’ve never imagine that projector could make my life so splendid. The picture is great, really rich colors even ont the wall(there’s a projector curtain in the box for a option). The sound is great and can be heard easily throughout my entire living room and the picture quality is phenomonal. There is also little to no noise coming from the projector which once you start watching something you completely forget about it. When summer comes, We are able to take it outside. I would highly recommend this to anyone who wants a personal projector to use for movies, video games and sports games at get together's or for any occasion. Awesome value for and an awesome product!

Product Title: Luby Portable Movie Projector with Free Projector Screen Perfect for Fun Camping Neighborhood Gathering Backyard Movie
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2019
Review Title: Not meant to be used in bright/ well lit room
Review Description: My 1st purchase, not bad at all. Picture is pretty clear once you adjust it. The sound is very clear and loud as well. The downside is that it only shows great in the dark, the screen that came with it is not big enough to my liking its being measured diagonally not vertically, the picture won't fit unless device is up close. Waiting to test it outdoors once newly purchase screen arrives.

Product Title: Luby Portable Movie Projector with Free Projector Screen Perfect for Fun Camping Neighborhood Gathering Backyard Movie
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2019
Review Description: Holy crap! Buy this right now! Killer deal. I can't believe how great this projector works especially for the price. I just use it recreationalky to have movie nights with friends. It came with a large tv screen sized cloth screen that i have not used yet. We project onto our white cloth curtains in our living room & that works great! The projector came with the cords i needed to hook up my laptop & I just turn on Hulu or HBO or Netflix, pick your poison & go. It's wonderful.I recommend you save the box it comes in. I plan to bring this little guy to friends houses or perhaps to use for work presentations.I'm stoked.

Product Title: Luby Portable Movie Projector with Free Projector Screen Perfect for Fun Camping Neighborhood Gathering Backyard Movie
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2020
Review Description: Other than not being able to use the remote (as it was broken upon arrival) It’s a very nice system. Can’t speak for the volume as there is no way to control it without the use of the remote. Went out and purchased new, high quality, batteries and it still does not function. As I work night shift as a nurse, I really don’t want to return the entire system due to just a faulty remote 🤦‍♀️ Any suggestions are very welcome at this point. Again, besides the non-functioning remote, the picture is awesome and can’t speak on the sound as I can’t control it 🤦‍♀️
